controlHintList.description: PIT Menu Open - Rebinding Input - CANCEL
PIT Menu Open - NAVIGATE/SELECT

Shopping - Trying on item - ROTATE
Looting - Active - EXIT
Arms/Prone-Lock - MobiGlas (Medical Beacon Request)

Inventory Open - Click & Drag

QSWheel Open - RELEASE INPUT

VideoComm Receiving Call - mobiGlas
Customizing Weapon - Select
In KIOSK - NAVIGATE/SELECT
Pre-Take, or Take, or Stow, or Unstow - BLANK
Priming or Ready to throw Primed Grenade - BLANK
Interact Mode - Toggle Interact Mode: False - INTERACT
Interact Mode - Toggle Interact Mode: True - INTERACT
Interact Mode - Nothing Under Cursor - BLANK
In Freelook - FREE LOOK TOGGLE
Ladder - UP
MOUNTED GUN - Gripping Weapon Mount - FIRE
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - FREE LOOK

Holding Carryable - Place/Throw: Placing - PLACE
Interact Mode - INTERACT
Interact Mode - Nothing Under Cursor - BLANK
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - SPRINT
mobiGlass - Open - OPEN TOGGLE
Knocked Down (MID FALL) - BLANK
Bleeding - Holding MediPen - HEAL SELF
Bleeding - NOT Holding/have attached MedPen or held Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - MedGun Attached OR Stored - EQUIP MED-GUN
Bleeding - NOT Holding/have attached MedPen or held Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - Multi-Tool Healing Attached OR Stored - EQUIP MULTI-TOOL
Bleeding - Holding Multi-Tool - NOT with equipped healing attachment AND has stored healing attachment - CUSTOMISE WEAPON
Depressurized + Helmet In Hands - EQUIP HELMET
Depressurized + Helmet On Hip - EQUIP HELMET
Helmet Visor Needs Wiping - WIPE VISOR
Near TAKEDOWN - LETHAL TAKEDOWN
Prone - Back OR Front - PRONE TOGGLE (exit)
EVA - Movement - THRUST HORIZONTAL
Unarmed Fists - LIGHT ATTACK
Melee Knife - SLASH (LIGHT)
Holding Pen - Healing - HEAL SELF
Holding Pen - Mask Symptoms - MASK SYMPTOMS (INJECT SELF)
Holding Pen - Overdose Revival - REDUCE BDL (INJECT SELF)
Holding Pen - Oxygen - OXYGENATE (INJECT SELF)
In Generic Usable - BLANK
Holding Food OR Drink + Helmet On Head + Default Not Consume - ATTACH HELMET TO HIP
Holding Food OR Drink + Helmet On Head - ATTACH HELMET TO HIP
Holding Grenade - THROW GRENADE - OVERARM
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - Ammo On Suit OR Ammo in Inventory - RELOAD
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - No Ammo - Other Weapon On Suit OR Inventory - WEAPON SELECT [1]
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - No Ammo - Other Weapon On Suit OR Inventory - WEAPON SELECT [3]
Holding MultiTool - No Attachment - Tool Attachment in Inventory - CUSTOMIZE
Holding Tractor Beam (Dedicated Gun OR Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Mining Beam (Dedicated Gun OR Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Medical Beam (Dedicated Gun) - Aim At Self - SHOOT
Holding Medical Beam (Multi-Tool) - Aim At Self - SHOOT
Holding Medical Beam (Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Salvage / Repair (Dedicated Gun OR Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Weapon - Ready - FIRE
Holding Weapon - Inspecting - Can Be Customised - CUSTOMIZE
Holding Drink - Currently Primary Action -  CONSUME (Drink)
Holding Carryable Item - DEFAULT (PRIMARY ACTION)
Holding Food - CONSUME (Eat)
Helmet On Hip - EQUIP HELMET
Secondary Interaction Available on interaction prompt - DOUBLE TAP INTERACT
Offscreen Interaction Available - QUICK INTERACT
Nothing Equipped In Hand - (Not Greenzone, Not Ladder) - EQUIP WEAPON [1]
Nothing Equipped In Hand - (Not Greenzone, Not Ladder) - EQUIP WEAPON [3]
**Holding Weapon - Ammo Low - Ammo In Inventory OR On Suit - RELOAD   **Needs check for matching ammo - also new ActorItem attachment types

Holding MedGun - Aim At Self - Toggle Interact Mode: True -  SET DOSE

Holding MedGun - ADS - Toggle Interact Mode: True -  SET DOSE and EXIT ADS

Holding Weapon - ADS - Toggle Option False - Gadget - EXIT ADS

Holding Weapon - ADS - Toggle Option - Always Show - EXIT ADS

Holding Pen - Oxygen - INJECT OTHER (OXYGENATE)

Near Mantle - MANTLE/VAULT

Health Damaged (<90%) - NOT Holding MedPen or Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - MedPen Attached OR Stored - EQUIP MEDPEN

Injured - Painkiller Required - Not Masked - NOT Holding Pen OR Medgun - EQUIP ADRENALINE PEN
Injured - Painkiller Required - Not Masked - NOT Holding Pen OR Medgun - EQUIP STEROID PEN

Holding Weapon with Alt Fire Mode - No GreenZone - ALT FIRE MODE
Holding Weapon/Gadget Ready - Has UnderBarrel Attachment - USE ATTACHMENT

Unarmed Fists - GreenZone - LOWER FISTS

Unarmed Fists or Melee Knife - BLOCK & DODGE
Melee Knife OR Unarmed Fists Blocking - DODGE

Holding Weapon - In Melee Range (NOT Takedown) - WEAPON MELEE
